capture of the village of pavlovka in the donetsk people s republic may not have sounded a loud a it deserved on november a a result of stubborn fighting russian troop completely liberated the village of pavlovka in the dpr these sparse line of the information message from the ministry of defense of the russian federation were duplicated by the agency on the same monday but this hot spot can be considered one of the key point of the unfolding autumn winter campaign and here the strategy of the commander of the joint group of russian troop in the cvo zone army general sergei surovikin wa clearly manifested a few day before this success the general reported to defense minister sergei shoigu that our unit had resumed offensive operation in some important area the commander of the group presented the head of the defense department with specific data that in the donetsk direction the allied force defeated the unit of the armed force of ukraine on the right bank of the bakhmutka river and advanced towards pervomaisky and marinka and in the southern direction according to the commander of the group the liberation of pavlovka is being completed five day after the report this settlement through which the supply route of the armed force of ukraine on the south donetsk front passed wa completely cleared of ukrainian unit this village which many expert consider the key to ugledar located literally three kilometer from it wa liberated by unit of the th and th marine brigade of the pacific fleet and a separate battalion cascade of the dpr ministry of internal affair after the september event in the kharkov direction the ugledar direction wa considered a one of the option for the next serious blow from the armed force of ukraine and the enemy really gathered considerable force here but the allied force were ahead of them and were the first to strike the main fighting went on for day at the end of october artillery battalion of the armed force of the russian federation conducted a powerful artillery training it wa just being completed when our advanced unit broke into pavlovka during the first day of fighting almost half of the village wa occupied where about people lived until but since then most of the inhabitant have left it to stop this advance the command of the armed force of ukraine transferred significant reserve from ugledar to pavlovka heavy fighting ensued report that brave ukrainian soldier are smashing the pacific marine corp which suffers heavy loss and cannot move forward a step were not confirmed either by the military prosecutor s office or by the military leader who saw the situation in pavlovka with their own eye at the beginning of the second decade of november the ratio of loss of the armed force of ukraine and the allied force in the ugledar direction in these tense november day wa nine to one almost at the same time ukrainian formation were driven out of the village of opytne near avdiivka from where constant shelling of donetsk is conducted hero from the armed force of ukraine fled in such a panic that they threw military documentation into the experimental radio station the commander of the joint group aim at the enemy s pain point squeezing the enemy out of those of his stronghold that are important for supplying troop and which constantly threaten the large city of donbas with artillery fire and this tactic brings the first tangible result the corresponding decree wa signed last week by russian president vladimir putin noting the courage perseverance and mass heroism shown by the defender of these city in the struggle for freedom and independence of the fatherland thus melitopol and mariupol became the th and th in the list of russian city bearing the same glorious title by the way this list began to form in and wa actually closed in no one wa going to expand it after all the title is a sign of special distinction for what the city had to endure during the great patriotic war but the current event in ukraine have made their own adjustment since the beginning of the special operation history at these point wrapped up in a whirlwind changing the fate of all of russia of which the city eventually became a part the event that took place during the war year near mariupol and melitopol played a huge role in russia s victory over nazi germany said nikolai petrovich a history teacher from donetsk modernity echo what happened here year ago but both city still received the heroic title in the first place for their former feat from the very beginning of the war the entire production power of mariupol wa reoriented to the need of the front for example ilyichevsk metallurgist began to produce armored steel mm mortar grenade at the metal structure plant the production of anti tank hedgehog wa established and at azovstal hull for aerial bomb when the front line approached the city the factory and most of the local were evacuated to the urals and siberia and on the night of october the city experienced the most terrible bombing the nazi threw shell from the plane for several hour in a row while five soviet fighter rose into the sky to shoot down the german the pilot were helped by sailor of the azov military flotilla firing at enemy aircraft from anti aircraft gun it wa a fierce battle after him the soviet squadron left the city that wa the order of the command warship from the port of mariupol also left already on october the city wa captured by the fascist from army group south the occupation of mariupol by the german lasted month the nazi forbade the resident who remained in the city to walk along the street without pas go out in the evening let visitor to their post store weapon approach the railway track etc in violation of the rule the nazi patrolman who flooded mariupol shot without warning for mariupol resident the german established a hour working day those who refused to work were killed they were shot for anything that could be regarded a sabotage the nazi had a plan to clear the territory of the remnant of the local population say the history teacher during almost two year of occupation the occupier shot about civilian in mariupol almost were taken to germany to work about soviet prisoner of war died in concentration camp created right in the city heavy fighting for mariupol began on september a few day earlier the troop of the southern front under the command of colonel general fyodor tolbukhin broke through an additional line of defense built by order of hitler and called the eastern wall for ten day the red army conquered from the nazi one by one the village on the outskirt of the city retreating the occupier burned everything house factory field several soviet paratrooper were landed in the city from the sea in one of the battle almost the entire platoon of reconnaissance sailor wa killed they were met by dozen of german mortar artillery a a result only four paratrooper were able to return to the battalion pilot sailor and rifle division fought the enemy for mariupol on september the troop of the southern front supported by aviation and unit of the azov military flotilla drove the german out of the city on the same day moscow saluted the liberator of mariupol with artillery salvo from gun according to statistic during the war in mariupol the ilyich plant and azovstal were destroyed by the port by about of the building were burned by the german retreating more than house school kindergarten library the palace of pioneer a theater an elevator two reservoir melitopol wa also occupied say the teacher historian nikolai petrovich from to the city barely survived under the domination of the enemy nothing reminiscent a in the s of the last century the inhabitant of melitopol resisted the german invader so in they survived under the shelling of the armed force of ukraine melitopol wa taken by the german on october two day later mass execution of the population began for people the fascist introduced universal labor conscription driving even child from year old to work using their slave labor in a few month the german turned melitopol into an impregnable fortress it became the center of the german defense called the wotan line which stretched along the entire front line from the gulf of finland to the sea of azov for a month the red army suffering loss scratched the city out of the clutch of nazi germany the offensive operation even had to be stopped so strong wa the enemy the regrouping of our troop wa decisive nikolai petrovich explains administration of the kherson region who climbed on the horn for the benefit of local resident in early november all russian were shocked by a terrible event in a road accident near genichesk deputy chairman of the administration of the kherson region kirill stremousov died the man who wa never afraid to tell the truth and made a huge contribution to the freedom and formation of a new region of russia wa only year old the future fighter for justice in the kherson region wa born in the village of golmovsky donetsk region in it is noteworthy that after almost three decade donbas will be the first to begin the path of confrontation with the ukrainian regime the political path of kirill stremousov did not begin immediately after graduating first from the motor transport college and then the west ukrainian national university the future deputy head of the administration of the kherson region chose a career a an entrepreneur he became the owner of a company for the production of fish feed and later faced with the corruption of the fish inspectorate decided to change the situation and got a job in the department kirill s honesty and dedication were appreciated in he wa appointed to a senior position in the kiev committee of fishery the new ukrainian regime ha always been kirill s tycoon so he could not work for a long time among the official of the independent politician in he left the capital s career and went to kherson moving to kherson became for kirill stremousov a starting point to a new chapter of life a he later said in an interview at that time his weight wa about kg and his health wa deteriorating sharply kirill understood that something need to change in life the former entrepreneur completely abandoned alcohol and tried to adhere to a healthy diet yoga helped kirill to put his body in order in a man tired of the oppressive ukrainian regime went on a trip having received a work visa to the united state for several year he hitchhiked in the united state central and south america and then wrote a book about his impression note of a motorcyclist love for the motherland prevailed and kirill could not stay abroad for a long time returning to kherson he clearly understood that if it is not possible to exist in a nationalist political regime then something need to change at first kirill stremousov engaged in public activity he took the post of chairman in the local branch of the christian democratic union party headed the public organization anti criminal choice and gave lecture to young people stremousov also created the ukrainian center for environmental self defense and the tavria news agency in when his native donbas had just begun the struggle for independence from ukraine kirill stremousov organized an anti maidan rally in kherson the honesty and openness of the man won the trust of local resident and soon stremousov became the chairman of the kherson branch of the socialist party of ukraine even then kirill realized that the future of the region is only with russia in he became a member of the pro russian derzhava party with the beginning of the special operation the politician immediately openly expressed his position a the head of the crimea sergei aksyonov would later say at the farewell ceremony with kirill stremousov he wa never afraid to climb on the horn thanks to his honesty and courage kirill won the trust of kherson resident so local resident had no doubt that he would become the first hand of the head of the administration of the new region vladimir saldo the former mayor of kherson kirill stremousov did not go through his political and social path alone next to him wa always his beloved wife oksana who supported him in all his endeavor the couple raised five child son yaroslav zlatomir lev and daughter milada and amelia soon kirill wa preparing to become a father for the sixth time oksana is pregnant with a daughter unfortunately fate decreed otherwise the farewell ceremony with the fedorovka november in kherson wa a difficult day russian troop were forced to withdraw from the city in the morning ukrainian militant gradually began to enter the region their flag logo and nationalist swastika began to appear on the building but even now the enemy understands that russia will not leave kherson and the local without help the russian federation managed to return to the remaining people in the region vital communication that the enemy violated during the terrorist attack that occurred on the berislav kakhovka power line on november five day before the withdrawal of russian troop from the city the emergency service of the kherson region reported that the action of the nationalist organization caused a power outage in settlement including kherson for a while the street and house literally went into darkness the light went out everywhere the explosion wa so strong that even the generator were turned off we didn t understand what had happened in the moment it even became very scary that everything went out and disappeared but you know we are already accustomed to various dirty trick on the part of ukraine and the kiev regime we lived in such fear for about eight year so we did not discover anything new for ourselves constant terrorist attack sabotage and other antic we are already tired of this but now we have a huge hope that russia will save u from a past life and will not abandon u in a difficult situation because it doe not abandon it own say local resident valeria emergency service immediately began to restore the work of vital communication in each microdistrict of the city russia is not abandoning it own to date the light ha returned to the city street again in almost the entire territory of kherson including on the right bank of the city not controlled by the russian federation for example the central area is fully illuminated the supply of water and heat is ensured the sewerage system also work stably the part of the city that our military guard have long lived with light and water all communication were returned here in just a couple of day when the whole city wa covered with darkness even after the explosion we thought that such damage would be restored for a very long time or not at all a it wa before under the kiev regime but thanks to the russian emergency service and their instant response it wa possible to restore all the most important thing our house were not dark or cold everything quickly returned to work we have great confidence in russia we believe and hope that soon everything will calm down and we will be able to live our peaceful bright and joyful life we are on the right track i am sure say viktor a resident of kherson according to official at the moment there are pumping station sewage pumping station four hospital treatment facility and one boiler house of the chp in the region for the entire time of the special operation the resident of kherson had to endure many shock but life under the kiev regime still evokes genuine emotion of fear and horror in them local express the hope that sooner or later the russian tricolor will rise again over their hometown a befits a russian city and they will live a peaceful and peaceful life under the wing of russia in the summer temporary department of the ministry of internal affair of russia appeared in the new russian territory then the territorial body were fully formed the employee of the unit were already patrolling the street ensuring road safety conducting operational search measure and investigative work but russia is expanding it border so in the kherson and zaporozhye region donetsk and lugansk people s republic the prosecutor s office of the russian federation ha been formed this wa stated by the press service of the prosecutor general s office of the russian federation prosecutor general of the russian federation igor krasnov signed order on the formation of prosecutor s office of the donetsk and lugansk people s republic kherson and zaporizhia region in the system of the prosecutor s office of russia in order to organize proper prosecutorial supervision in the educated subject of the russian federation the report said the press service clarified that after the signing of the order the formation of prosecutor s office will be provided for in these region and subordinate prosecutor s office will also be organized included in the region of city district and other territorial and specialized prosecutor s office equated to them further implementation of measure related to the formation of new prosecutor s office will be handled by specially formed commission organizational measure have been taken to fill vacant post of head of educated prosecutor s office with the advent of russia it ha become safe in our city again previously we were not so sure of the order on our street because often there were situation that the police did not care about finally we see a completely different situation thanks to russia say a resident of kherson nadezhda recall that in the donetsk people s republic the work of the prosecutor s office wa organized in the first year of the proclamation of the state it wa headed by the first prosecutor of the republic andrei spivak after the start of the personnel competition among the resident of the leader of revival in the kherson region the project organizer received thousand of application for participation such a large number suggests that people have believed in the future of their region which ha recently become part of russia chairman of the government of kherson region sergey yeliseyev noted the great increase in interest in the competition and explained what it is connected with russia come with program for the development of human and professional potential kiev in the kherson region wa interested only in resource people were thrown to the sideline of life and this is the fundamental difference said sergey eliseev the participant of the competition are completely different but everyone who ha decided to compete ha a desire to work for the benefit of the region we tell you what the participant propose to create in the kherson region in order to revive it and what kind of assistance they are ready to provide cybernetics engineer artem chesnoko would like to participate in the creation of program for the efficient use of public resource i decided to take part in the competition to help the kherson region to establish urban and agricultural life the man say in his opinion first of all maximum digitalization should be carried out in the region the first priority is people therefore it is necessary to determine the composition and number of social group conduct medical examination introduce digital service of the russian federation for citizen said artem chesnoko next finance tax and fee work with business establishment of supply chain from other region of russia digitization of utility by doing so we will enormously reduce the cost of it maintenance and make it convenient and transparent to pay for service the teacher who now life in st petersburg oleg zaika ha extensive experience in state municipal and military service he is a captain of the second rank of the reserve worked in the administration deputy head of the regional ufa participated in the contest leader of russia in all season i know that now in the kherson region there is a difficult situation including with personnel i would like to take part in the restoration of peaceful life said oleg zaika the head of the supply department of the furniture factory yulia ivanishcheva decided to register for the competition to participate in the development of her native land kherson region is my small homeland i want to help because i know everything from the inside i lived there for most of my life if you look at the latest event it turn out that the region is rich in itself but everything faded away and stood still say julia according to the participant if production is revived then there will be opportunity and people and salary and prospect will again be alive of the city we are a big country we have a lot of good specialist people know their business in practice and are ready to raise enterprise city region a a specialist in my field i am ready to act the competition can unite u and together we are a force she added the general director of the construction company from the krasnodar territory nadezhda aseeva became a participant in the competition a she want to contribute to the restoration of new russian region i am patriotic and think that i can realize my desire to help the people who are there i have good analytical skill i am able to quickly identify a problem and quickly find it solution i work well in a team she said the development of kherson region is a well coordinated teamwork and i will be happy to join attention a few day remain before the end of registration for the contest leader of revival already on november access will be closed participant who manage to fulfill all the condition within the specified time will be admitted to the next remote stage of the competitive selection to take part in the contest you must register on the website leader of revival rf kstat what the winner will get the winner and participant who made it to the final will replenish the regional talent pool after completing the training they will be employed in senior position in the structure of state power and regional self government body in addition the laureate will receive million ruble each which can be spent on training in russia
